file.string: CineFan es tu red social cinematográfica
Descubre, comenta y comparte películas con otros cinéfilos
Desarrollado por Juan Carlos y Angel Hernandez

• Sé específico sobre lo que te gustó o no
• Evita spoilers
• Explica tus razones
• Respeta otras opiniones
Comparte tu opinión sobre la película
CineFan necesita acceso a tu ubicación para mostrar tu posición en el mapa y calcular rutas

Sin acceso a ubicación. Algunas funciones estarán limitadas

Trucada finalitzada - Comparteix la teva experiència cinematogràfica
Has rebut un missatge relacionat amb cinema
Discover, share and connect with other movie lovers. Manage your personal collection and read community reviews.
CineFan is your social network to share and discover movie opinions. Explore reviews from other film lovers, share your own reviews and find your next favorite movie.
What do you want to do today?
Username must be at least 3 characters
Password must be at least 6 characters
Don\'t have an account? Register here
Already have an account? Sign in here
I accept the terms and conditions
Start adding your favorite movies to manage your personal collection.
Type to search in your collection
Share your opinion about this movie...

• Avoid major spoilers
• Comment what you liked and didn't like
• Be respectful of other opinions
• Describe your emotions watching it
Share your opinion about movies you\'ve watched by writing reviews.
Be the first to share a review with the community.
CineFan needs access to your location to show your position on the map and calculate routes.
No location access. Some features will be limited.
Location permission needed for this feature
Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete your review of \"%1$s\"?
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to exit the application?

CineFan is a social network for movie lovers developed as a student project.

Version: 1.0
Developed by: DAM Student
Institute: Jaume Huguet, Valls

For help or to report problems:

• Check included documentation
• Contact developer
• Review features in main menu
